snippet: North Korea backed down from its threat to cancel the reunions if South Korea and the United States went ahead with military exercises.
abstract: North Korea says that it will honor its agreement to allow hundreds of older Koreans separated by the Korean War to reunite with their long-lost relatives in South Korea.
lead_paragraph: North Korea backed down from its threat to cancel the reunions if South Korea and the United States went ahead with military exercises.

headline.main: 2 Koreas to Proceed With Reunions of Families Separated by War
headline.print_headline: 2 Koreas to Proceed With Reunions of Families Separated by War

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
